roleset.name: to make timid, fill with fear
roleset.note: TIMID-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from timid.01-j)

example.name: timid-j
example.text: The pitcher has to find out if the hitter is timid

example.name: timid-j
example.text: . As soon as you browbeat us , it instead makes us feel that your hearts are quite empty / timid / hesitant ,
